name: Aerith in Vegas
description: So, for Fresh's theme today, we were to make something vegas themed. I had to cancel last minute due to a few things so i felt sad. So, what makes me sad...Aerith. If you are a Final Fantasy fan, you know what I mean. So this is for her!
author: SlashaLO

reviews.text: This is really good. Mixed with no subs this is a solid key lime cheesecake. Your cheesecake combo works perfectly. The graham cracker makes a really great crust, and the pink guava and lime pair really well together gives you really great key lime style citrus. With out the harshness that alot citrus flavors have. Also it survives a steep mine steeped for close to 2.5 months. Excellent job man and thanks for sharing
